mint_tea.name: Soothing Mint Tea
mint_tea.description: You steep the mint you gathered into a calming tea. Echo claims the aroma softens predator tempers.

brambleroot_decoction.name: Brambleroot Decoction
brambleroot_decoction.description: A bitter brew that leaves your tools slick, helping you hack through bramble snarls.

dream_fern_infusion.name: Dream Fern Infusion
dream_fern_infusion.description: A twilight-toned tea that leaves your mind limber for late watches and vivid dreams.

primitive_mortar.name: Primitive Mortar
primitive_mortar.description: You mix the clay, sand, and ash in the gold pan, working them into a thick, gritty paste. The mortar feels rough but serviceableâ€”strong enough to bind stone fragments together.

water_clarity_tea.name: Water-Clarity Tea
water_clarity_tea.description: A tea brewed with chaga, mussels, and glow-dust. The Naiad's recipe brings clarity to your mind, helping you see through the forest's distortions and remember paths more clearly.

focus_clarity_tea.name: Focus/Clarity Tea
focus_clarity_tea.description: The Druid's recipe combines spore puff and chaga to sharpen your focus. Useful for examining landmarks and working with runestones.

dreamleaf_tea.name: Dreamleaf Tea
dreamleaf_tea.description: Astrin's special blend of glow-dust and calming herbs. When drunk before resting at the Glade, it brings deeper rest and comfort.
